# BNNS.ReductionFunction.minIndex

**Case**

A function for reduction that computes the index of the minimum value.

## Declaration

```swift
case minIndex
```

## Deprecated Symbols

- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.maxIndex**: A function for reduction that computes the index of the maximum value.
